name: APOCALYPSE TP: THE RERECKONING OF THE TOILETPAPERLESS
name_original: APOCALYPSE TP: THE RERECKONING OF THE TOILETPAPERLESS
description:
The RERECKONING is upon us. Once more, Plague Doctor must venture out to an abandoned warehouse to find the precious and most sought out resource of the pandemic: Toilet Paper. 

Experience the Toiletpaperless' greed in 3D as you must walk, run, jump over obstacles, hop from shelf to shelf and avoid getting your toilet paper stolen.

Just download the .zip file, load the .exe application file, and see how much of this limited quarantine luxury you can collect.

Goal:

Collect the set amount of toilet paper to progress to the next level, get the largest amount possible

Controls:

W- Move Forward

S- Move Backwards

A- Move Left

D- Move Right

W+Shift - Sprint

W + Space - Jump

Hold Right mouse button to move the camera

Made with Unity

Credits:

Programming all done  myself

Music:
